Articles.Content: Hi I had KSP for a while now and I loved it. I always played it on my windows. I decided to get KSP for Mac but it doesn't work. All that happenens is the beach ball of death and it doesn't load in. Can I have help? Thx

Hi ago, it's impossible to know what is going on from what you've told us, so please locate your Player.log (see the support stickies in this section) and post the contents to [**hastebin**](hastebin.com) for us.
